Text:
Great movie! Any chance for a 720p version? My DMA only supports 720p and one of my old LCD's only support 720p.

Thx!
can you burn this to a dl dvd and use it as a dvd9?

Are english subtitles embedded in the mkv? I hope so (I don't hear so good). The popular subtitle websites don't have subtitles for this release. I wish every movie release automatically included subtitles. They are such tiny little files but extremely useful things.
